title: I CANT PLAY ARAM OR NEW GM RITO PLZ
body:
Rito Please I COULDNT PLAY YESTERDAY AND I CANT PLAY TODAY{{champion:103}} up and fix this for me im going to {{champion:105}} my pants If i dont get those summoner icons before its gone this isnt fair

{{champion:39}} need help on how to fix this i tryed to restart and stuff but {{champion:6}}  to be kidding me, this is {{champion:412}}  and its {{champion:119}}  me crazy I swear ive tryed a {{champion:26}} times but but not {{champion:1}}thing will work, even my mate {{champion:238}}  that he cant help me please rito it {{champion:99}}  like its not working, this is {{champion:266}}iously not funny {{champion:60}} help me and reset my games able to be played   {{champion:63}} new or some {{champion:105}} i screamed so hard it {{champion:245}}ed through the walls so plz rito im serious help me and {{champion:103}}  up plz
